column4: I just got Proxomitron working good via Wine on intrepid. Started experimenting with this kind of proxy filter to deal with ads (on Galeon or Epiphany). Seems like Firefox, Opera, Konqueror already have adequate filters (esp. Firefox). Is Proxomitron more trouble than it's worth in linux?
have you looked into privoxy yet?
privoxy does the same thing, and it's linux native as well
